title: Optimization of Online Mathematics Learning Environments: Strengthening Administrator Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Emphasizing online learning environment design competencies for managers/leaders overseeing corporate mathematics education programs

learning_goals: Explain at least three effective interaction strategies in online and offline learning environments
Design practical applications of digital tools for mathematical learning assessment by applying them to real-world cases
Propose improvements for online assessment systems incorporating learner feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
